channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-25605|2024-08-02T11:25:19.310Z -- fortinet -- fortisoar
item.description: A improper access control vulnerability in Fortinet FortiSOAR 7.3.0 - 7.3.1 allows an attacker authenticated on the administrative interface to perform unauthorized actions via crafted HTTP requests.

item.title: CVE-2023-28000|2024-08-02T12:23:30.855Z -- fortinet -- fortiadc
item.description: An improper neutralization of special elements used in an OS command vulnerability [CWE-78] in FortiADC CLI 7.1.0, 7.0.0 through 7.0.3, 6.2.0 through 6.2.4, 6.1 all versions, 6.0 all versions may allow a local and authenticated attacker to execute unauthorized commands via specifically crafted arguments in diagnose system df CLI command.

item.title: CVE-2023-26210|2024-08-02T11:46:23.415Z -- fortinet -- fortiadcmanager
item.description: Multiple improper neutralization of special elements used in an os command ('OS Command Injection') vulnerabilties [CWE-78] in Fortinet FortiADCManager version 7.1.0 and before 7.0.0, FortiADC version 7.2.0 and before 7.1.2 allows a local authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary shell code as `root` user via crafted CLI requests.

item.title: CVE-2023-26204|2024-08-02T11:39:06.667Z -- fortinet -- fortisiem
item.description: A plaintext storage of a password vulnerability [CWE-256] in FortiSIEM 6.7 all versions, 6.6 all versions, 6.5 all versions, 6.4 all versions, 6.3 all versions, 6.2 all versions, 6.1 all versions, 5.4 all versions, 5.3 all versions may allow an attacker able to access user DB content to impersonate any admin user on the device GUI.

item.title: CVE-2023-27995|2024-08-02T12:23:30.814Z -- fortinet -- fortisoar
item.description: A improper neutralization of special elements used in a template engine vulnerability in Fortinet FortiSOAR 7.3.0 through 7.3.1 allows an authenticated, remote attacker to execute arbitrary code via a crafted payload.
